name: Spiritua Fighter
description:
Mark's life is a wreck. He lives day to day, paycheck to paycheck, vice to vice.

Help him enter his mind and fight his way to salvation, defeating enemies and avoiding dangers along the way by influencing the world around him by drawing! Discover new abilities hidden deep down in your mind in order to grow spiritually and destroy anyone standing in your way!

This task can be challenging, sometimes you will fail, but in the end remember - this is for your spirit!
